Sentencas: As the cathode is a central component of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs), evaluation of cathodes for SOFCs has become a favorite research subject.
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs

Sentencas: In the present research, a comprehensive impedance spectroscopy (EIS) analysis is performed to understand the effect of zirconium replacement by cerium on polarization characteristics of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3 (LSM)-Zr0.84Y0.16O1.92 (YSZ8) composite cathode.
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs

Sentencas: Three solid oxide fuel cell electrolytes, Ce0.42Zr0.42Y0.16O1.92 (CZY), Ce0.84Y0.16O1.92 (CY) and YSZ8 prepared by solid state reaction, were mixed with appropriate amount of LSM compound to prepare three composite cathodes named LSM-x wt% CZY, LSM-x wt% CY and LSM-x wt% YSZ (x = 30, 50 and 70).
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs

Sentencas: The X-ray diffraction analysis has been revealed that LSM is chemically agreeable with all electrolytes, and no undesired reaction happened between them throughout the sintering procedure up to 1350 degrees
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs
Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) for all the prepared electrolyte materials and LSM cathode, show that they are thermomechanically compatible with each other.
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs

Sentencas: Results of the electrochemical analysis of symmetrical cells show that the lowest polarization of 0.38 is found by the composition 0.5LSM-0.5YSZ and the highest polarization resistance of 2.72 omega cm(2) is exhibited by the composition 0.3LSM-0.7CZY in the temperature range of 600-850 degrees C.
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs

Sentencas: The composites having YSZ8 and CZY sintered at 1250 degrees C and CY sintered at 1350 degrees C showed the maximum electrochemical performance of the cathodes.
Titulo: Evaluating the cathodic polarization of La0.7Sr0.3MnO3-Zr0.84-xCexY0.16O1.92 (x=0, 0.42, 0.84) composites for SOFCs
